Title: Establishes the bureau of the senior tenants' advocate in the state office for the aging
Summary: Establishes the bureau of the senior tenants' advocate within the state office for the aging; provides that the senior tenants' advocate shall assist senior citizen tenants in resolving complaints they may have with the New York state division of housing and community renewal, landlord disputes, rent increases, and other housing related matters; provides that the governor shall appoint the senior tenants' advocate.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the elder law, in relation to establishing the bureau of the senior tenants' advocate in the state office for the aging
